title: TUTORIAL Miniature crocosmia (montbretia) with air dry clay | PDF + video
description: The price includes a tutorial on creating a realistic miniature Crocosmia (Montbretia) branch with air dry clay for dollhouses at a scale of 1:12. This tutorial is a PDF file with a description of the necessary materials, a link to the video, and text instructions. For your convenience, the video is uploaded to YT and has subtitles in English.
